title: LF Gold+ Active players for ranked 5s team
body:
Looking for a few active members for a ranked 5's team. Building a casual team which will aim to climb ranks and have fun whilst doing so.

Current roster includes ADC and MID.

Requirements:
- Preferably on everyday/most of the week
- Can install TeamSpeak3, no need to talk/just listen
- Gold+
- Does not rage/or is ill mannered

Add me in game if you are interested: Orias
(Or post here)

:)

replies.body:
Hi Hinesy,

Apologies, but I have already maxed out on applicants. :)


Thanks anyway!
Yo I got me and 2 others interested all gold+ you guys on tonight?
